}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There is a single U.FL jack on the board.
"PN: 1244-00000662-01Z" and "MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA7675|08/05/2009}}
